articles.description: A new technique using ultrasound may offer a way to move or blast apart kidney stones with minimal pain while the patient is awake.
articles.content:
Ultrasound can be used to move, reposition, or break up kidney stones, all while the patient is awake, a new study finds.
The new technique, which combines the use of two ultrasound technologies, ma… [+3571 chars]
